availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred C. Tanner (Mclean Co & Ct court Clerk)

body.p: McLean County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married S. Mizella Tanner. Father of Andrew R. Tanner and Belle Tanner. Clerk of the McLean County Court and McLean Circuit Court in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, Calhoun, p. 3. H. Charles Ulman, Lawyers' Record and Official Register of the United States (New York: A. S. Barnes & Co., Publishers, 1872), 532. Find A Grave, "Alfred C. Tanner (1826-1890)," Memorial #127202728, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=127202728&ref=acom (accessed September, 13, 2017).
